item.title: Hello reprex
item.description: Disclaimer : I am a huge fan of the R language thus this post is biased toward the few things I know about Python and SAS linguas. Code practice One of the first advice I would give my past stat student self is to get better at coding ASAP. Indeed knowing better a language shapes also your thinking so you can organize yourself better with the task at hand and not feel too overwhelmed (like during your internship).

item.title: Working as a team with Python and R
item.description: Data structures in Python and R Py Example of question from Stack Overflow with python tag. How one can impute missing values from each (numeric) variable with a random value in the range [mean - standard_deviation , mean + standard_deviation] Side note : such imputation method should not work well, but this an other questionâ€¦ Once reformulated this problem can be rephrased into 2 problems : How to produce a number randomly from a sample {X} within the range [mean(X) - sd(X) , mean(X) + sd(X)] How to apply a transformation over the numeric variables of a data frame
